OOC: Mumbles something about being ignored and goes to look for a shotgun.

::Whistler::
       He looked up at the massive beam.  "Oh fun.  I get to be wounded ... 
again.  I wonder if anyone will notice this time."  The shockwave from the 
beam's blast shreds his back and he impales a tree.  (Yes, I mean that.)

--part1_65.1c884490.29061c73_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
